title: Gatick (preview for an interactive work)
creator_contributor_role: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM), production company
description: As part of the end of year screening for the Swinburne, EDIM (Electronic Design and Interactive Media) course - those students who had completed interactive coursework were required to create a linear representation of their work for the showreel. This student should be contacted and asked to submit the full work to the Interactive collection
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005723; Swinburne EDIM Graduate Screening 2002 - Pixel-pusher; Active; 2002
